title: Webinar Recording: Gift Vouchers and Online Promotions
text: A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings Discover how selling gift vouchers through MStore can boost your revenue and provide guaranteed income. We share examples of the various types of vouchers you can offer, including monetary, experience, and membership vouchers. Learn about the benefits of providing end customers with versatile internet promotion codes.
description:
A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings


Discover how selling gift vouchers through MStore can boost your revenue and provide guaranteed income. We share examples of the various types of vouchers you can offer, including monetary, experience, and membership vouchers. Learn about the benefits of providing end customers with versatile internet promotion codes.

title: Webinar Recording: Return Visits
text: A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings In this session we cover: How to implement Return Visits to enhance your customer offering. Encourage repeat visits and boost customer loyalty and spending. Practical tips for maximising customer engagement and retention. Insights into the powerful analytics tools available within MStore to track customer return visits, including who visits and when. How to easily change expiry dates and reissue tickets as needed.
description:
A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings


In this session we cover:

  • How to implement Return Visits to enhance your customer offering. Encourage repeat visits and boost customer loyalty and spending.

  • Practical tips for maximising customer engagement and retention.

  • Insights into the powerful analytics tools available within MStore to track customer return visits, including who visits and when.

  • How to easily change expiry dates and reissue tickets as needed.

title: Webinar Recording: Direct Debits & Online Memberships
text: A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings This session will guide you through setup and configuration of Direct Debits and Online Memberships, as well as navigating initial submissions with ease. You’ll learn how to ensure smooth transactions, handle payment submissions, and manage failures effectively. The session also covers adjustments and renewals to keep your ongoing memberships on track and explore how to maximise Gift Aid benefits for charitable organisations.
description:
A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings


This session will guide you through setup and configuration of Direct Debits and Online Memberships, as well as navigating initial submissions with ease. You’ll learn how to ensure smooth transactions, handle payment submissions, and manage failures effectively.

 
The session also covers adjustments and renewals to keep your ongoing memberships on track and explore how to maximise Gift Aid benefits for charitable organisations.

title: Webinar Recording: K3's innovative ordering solutions
text: A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings A webinar to demonstrate a suite of K3 products that are transforming the way restaurants, cafes, and bars engage with customers. During this session, you’ll learn about three powerful products designed to offer your customers a seamless and contactless ordering experience: K3|POP A simple and efficient online ordering solution, featuring click-and-collect and delivery options. Customers can browse your menu, order their favourite food and drinks, and pay securely all from their own devices. K3|TOP An in-house self-ordering system that allows customers to easily browse menus, place orders, and pay using their own devices via a QR code or NFC tag. Just scan or tap to access and order. K3|KIOSK An easy-to-use in-house self-service kiosk that enables customers to browse, order, and pay at the touch of a button. Our kiosks can also help with advertising, printing receipts, offering discounts, and processing payments. All our self-ordering solutions are highly configurable supporting meal bundles and modifiers to perfectly complement your attraction’s quick service hospitality offering, integrating perfectly with MStore kitchen operations and order ready boards.
description:
A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings


A webinar to demonstrate a suite of K3 products that are transforming the way restaurants, cafes, and bars engage with customers.

During this session, you’ll learn about three powerful products designed to offer your customers a seamless and contactless ordering experience:

 

K3|POP

A simple and efficient online ordering solution, featuring click-and-collect and delivery options. Customers can browse your menu, order their favourite food and drinks, and pay securely all from their own devices.

 

K3|TOP

An in-house self-ordering system that allows customers to easily browse menus, place orders, and pay using their own devices via a QR code or NFC tag. Just scan or tap to access and order.

 

K3|KIOSK

An easy-to-use in-house self-service kiosk that enables customers to browse, order, and pay at the touch of a button. Our kiosks can also help with advertising, printing receipts, offering discounts, and processing payments.

 

All our self-ordering solutions are highly configurable supporting meal bundles and modifiers to perfectly complement your attraction’s quick service hospitality offering, integrating perfectly with MStore kitchen operations and order ready boards.

title: Webinar Recording: Unlock the power of address verification
text: A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings Did you know that incorrect address data can lead to failed deliveries, undeliverable marketing campaigns, and lost revenue due to cart abandonment? Join us for an exclusive webinar where we’ll introduce Loqate, the global standard in address verification. Discover how their cutting-edge solution can help you: • Capture accurate addresses in real-time with type-ahead technology • Verify and enrich address data for 249 countries and territories • Improve customer experiences by reducing failed deliveries and CRM costs • Boost conversions by streamlining the checkout process
description:
A list of all webinar recordings can be found in Webinar Recordings


Did you know that incorrect address data can lead to failed deliveries, undeliverable marketing campaigns, and lost revenue due to cart abandonment?

Join us for an exclusive webinar where we’ll introduce Loqate, the global standard in address verification.

 

Discover how their cutting-edge solution can help you:

•            Capture accurate addresses in real-time with type-ahead technology

•            Verify and enrich address data for 249 countries and territories

•            Improve customer experiences by reducing failed deliveries and CRM costs

•            Boost conversions by streamlining the checkout process
